page_content:
Hunter Macdonald Limited

Application Packaging Services

Application Packaging Services to provide compatible software for Cloud Software Distribution and rationalisation and migration of current applications to cloud compatible software. Hunter Macdonald provides an end-to-end process including Application Landscape Assessment, Application Rationalisation and Application Packaging to target platform (Cloud Desktops, Cloud Software Distribution, VDI, Private, Hybrid or Public).

Features

  • Cloud Software Distribution, Cloud Desktop, Desktop as a Service (DaaS)
  • Application Discovery, Application Packaging, Software Distirbution and Software Delivery
  • Application Rationalisation, End of Life review, Cost Reduction, Compatibility Assessment
  • Approved Product List Generation, Software Asset Library (SAL), Asset Management
  • GDS Design Manual compliant Application Services Packaging and Deployment
  • Microsoft System Center, SCCM, Altiris, ManageEngine, LANDesk, AppSense, App-V
  • Citrix XenApp, Citrix XenDesktop, VDI, VMware View, ThinApp, Application Virtualisation
  • Business Transition to Cloud Based Services, Service Integrator
  • Cloud Service Provider Review, Selection and Support
  • Licensing Assessment, Capability Assessment, Packaging Factory, Unit Pricing

Benefits

  • Fixed price or SFIA, to best suit your business requirements
  • Outcome and deliverable based – ensuring business benefits are achieved
  • Identify cost reduction / savings (redundant applications or services)
  • Focus on cloud based application services to achieve savings
  • Driving delivery and service excellence using the cloud
  • Proven methodology from experienced team in cloud technology adoption
  • Integrated Infrastructure (IaaS) and Application (SaaS / PaaS) Services
  • Achieving business outcomes using cloud technology as an enabler
  • Achieving the deliverable and outcome required for the client
  • SC cleared resources, Security Cleared resources

Pricing

£522 per person per day

  • Including VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Day
